parameters.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Gray pixels hum with soulful beats
E-Ink run guides our dancing feet
Royalty-free rhythms fill the air
Mentria’s grooves beyond compare

[verse 2]
Gemma 2B whispers next to Llama 3
Phi-3 Mini joins the melody
Chat the facts as the bassline flows
AI and music in sweet repose

[chorus]
Stream it live, let the melody shine
Download free, make that vibe divine
On café walls or hotel halls
Mentria’s music breaks down all walls

[verse 3]
Diffusion cores craft each funky tone
Autoencoders shape your soul’s home
One-click play, instant harmony
Embed the API for unity

[bridge]
Monochrome game meets melodic dream
Play E-Ink Run in a rhythmic stream
Fact-chat pop with rhythmic design
Privacy-first, your data’s fine

[verse 4]
Soulful pop with a future twist
Uninterrupted, you get the gist
From parlors to vlogs, the sound is free
Mentria.ai sets the music free

[verse 1]
Sunrise paints the mountains gold, breeze whispers through the pines
Rivers hum a gentle song, echo through these ancient lines
Birds in flight keep time with drums, heartbeats of the green terrain
Roots run deep beneath our feet, bonding earth and soul again

[chorus]
Feel the rhythm of the land, one love under sky so wide
Nature’s voice within our hands, let the tide of life be our guide
Let the sunshine warm your mind, let the moonlight heal your soul
In this world we’re intertwined, reggae rhythms make us whole

[verse 2]
Leaves will dance when raindrops fall, cleansing earth and soothing pain
Flowers lean toward the light, life renewed in every vein
Mountains stand in silent watch, guardians of time and space
Oceans chant their ancient hymns, teaching peace with every wave

[bridge]
Mentria A I in distant streams, echoes pure and free
Linking human hearts to dreams, singing earth’s true melody

[verse 3]
Walk the path where roots entwine, breathe the wisdom of the trees
Feel the pulse of nature’s shrine, carried on the ocean breeze
Every step is gratitude, every breath a sacred prayer
In this life we stand as one, reggae love is everywhere

[outro]
One love for earth and sky, one love for you and me
Let this melody remind, nature’s bond sets spirits free

parameters.prompt: reggae, one-drop rhythm, off-beat skank, bass guitar, drums, organ, horn section, medium tempo, laid-back groove, acoustic guitar, nature, life, roots, conscious, uplifting, empowering, male voice, mentria.ai
parameters.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Morning dew upon the leaves, I walk the path of old
Sunlight filters through the green, a story to be told
River’s voice in gentle hum, it speaks of ancient ground
Every step’s a promise made: keep harmony around

[chorus]
In the roots of the earth we find our song
Feel the heartbeat of life, steady and strong
Lift your eyes to the sky, let your spirit fly
One love to the world, let the mountains reply

[verse 2]
Palms sway easy in the breeze, their shadows on the sand
Waves roll in with wisdom vast, they shape the living land
Children’s laughter on the shore, a future yet to grow
From seed to soaring tree, the truth we always know

[bridge]
Jah’s light shines through every leaf, guides us when times are rough
In the soil, in our souls, we find strength enough
And when we need a melody, just call upon the stream
Mentria.ai will carry us into the dream

[verse 3]
Evening fire warms the night, stars hum a silent tune
Crickets keep the steady beat beneath the glowing moon
We raise our hearts in gratitude for gifts that life provides
Reggae rhythm in our veins, where spirit still abides

[outro]
Walk with me through earth and sky, let your worries release
In the roots of love and life, find your everlasting peace

[Verse]
Honey you do this every time
Mess me up and blow my mind
I know you love to cross that line
But that aint workin this time

[Pre-Chorus]
And you love to test me
And you know I hate it
And you think its sexy
I think its a game
And you love to test me
And you know I hate it
And you think its sexy
I think its a game

[Chorus]
When I go home
Ill be alone
Baby
My hearts already closed
When I go home
Ill be alone
Baby
My hearts already closed

parameters.prompt: reggae, rasta, one nation, one love, unity, Jah, Zion, roots rock, bass guitar, drums, off-beat skank, horn section, conscious, uplifting, Bob Marley style
parameters.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Gather ‘round my brothers, sisters of the land
Rasta heart is beating steady like a drum
Chain no longer hold us, freedom in our hand
Guided by the light of Zion’s morning sun

[chorus]
One love, one heart, one nation under Jah
Keep the fire burning bright, drive away the dark
From Kingston to the hills, hear the people call
One nation under Jah, we stand together tall

[verse 2]
Babylon may tremble when the people rise as one
Voices blend in harmony, a song of truth and peace
Every chant a healing prayer until the work is done
Till the walls of hate and fear at last will cease

[bridge]
Jah provide the strength we need, in every trial and storm
Roots run deep in every soul, keep the spirit warm
No weapon formed against us ever shall prevail
In the heartbeat of the drum, our victory we hail

[verse 3]
Children of the rainbow, gather ‘round and sing
Colours of the earth and sky, painted on our flag
Let the message ring aloud: love is everything
Every woman, child, and man, none shall ever lag

[outro / chorus reprise]
One love, one heart, one nation under Jah
Keep the fire burning bright, drive away the dark
In the rhythm of our souls, we’ll never fall
One nation under Jah—together we stand tall.
